CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT and CHI are standing in room with several toys on rug
INV leaves room and shuts door
CHI squats next to jack+in+the+box and feels its top
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI watches what MOT does with jack+in+the+box
CHI sits on rug across from MOT and jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at CHI and smiles then looks back at jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI puts hand on top of jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at CHI and smiles then looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle on jack+in+the+box
MOT sits up straight and looks surprised
MOT leans close to CHI and peers at clown
CHI continues to look at clown
MOT pushes clown into box and shuts lid
<bef> MOT turns handle of jack+in+the+box again
CHI watches what MOT is doing
MOT stops turning handle on jack+in+the+box
CHI takes handle of jack+in+the+box and pulls jack+in+the+box over on its side
MOT takes jack+in+the+box from CHI and turns handle
CHI feels lid of jack+in+the+box with hand
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
MOT glances at CHI then back at jack+in+the+box
MOT stops turning handle of jack+in+the+box then continues slowly
MOT sits up straight and looks surprised
CHI feels head of clown then tries to push it back into the jack+in+the+box
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more and turns handle
CHI tries to shut lid on jack+in+the+box
MOT tries to shut lid on jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to push clown back in jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI push clown into box then shuts the lid
<aft> MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box by handle
MOT reaches for jack+in+the+box then turns handle of jack+in+the+box as CHI holds onto it
CHI looks at other toys on rug . <aft> CHI looks at duck
CHI lets go of jack+in+the+box then picks up rubber duck holding it in both hands
CHI slaps top of jack+in+the+box with hand then feels side of box then rests hand on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then back at duck
<aft> CHI squeezes duck making it quack and lets go of jack+in+the+box
CHI bangs on side of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks back at jack+in+the+box then looks at MOT
<bef> MOT glances at CHI then back at jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at CHI then back at jack+in+the+box
CHI feels and holds onto clown
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and lifts clown towards CHI
CHI continues to hold onto clown
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and lifts clown towards CHI again
CHI tries to push clown's head back into jack+in+the+box
MOT puts hands on box to help CHI then removes her hands
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box by clown's neck and sets it on his lap
CHI squeezes duck and makes it squeak
<bef> MOT squeezes duck in CHIs hand then stops
MOT squeezes duck in CHIs hand again
CHI holds jack+in+the+box on lap and tries to shut lid
MOT pulls lid of jack+in+the+box open more
CHI stops biting jack+in+the+box and touches lid of box
MOT takes jack+in+the+box from CHI and sets it on rug
CHI pushes clowns head into jack+in+the+box
MOT starts to close lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI puts hand on top of jack+in+the+box lid
MOT takes CHIs hand and pushes on lid of box then lets go of his hand and holds lid with her fingers
CHI tries to push lid totally closed
<bef> MOT lets go of lid with fingers
CHI grabs clown's head and tries to push it down into jack+in+the+box
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more then lets go
CHI pushes clowns head into jack+in+the+box
MOT takes CHIs hand out of jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes on lid of jack+in+the+box with hand
MOT presses lid of jack+in+the+box shut then lets go
clown of jack+in+the+box pops up again
CHI tries to push clown into jack+in+the+box
MOT tries to shut lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls hand out of box
clown popped up when CHI removed hand
CHI grabs clowns head and pushes it into jack+in+the+box then starts to let go of clown
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown into jack+in+the+box again
MOT watches CHI as he pulls the clown up and down
CHI starts to let go of clown again
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box again
CHI pushes clown into jack+in+the+box again
CHI starts to let go of clown
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown into jack+in+the+box again then starts to let go of clown
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clowns head sideways then lets go of it and picks up the rubber duck
<aft> CHI holds duck out to MOT
MOT takes duck from CHI then holds it on her hand and squeaks it
CHI looks at duck on MOTs hand then down at jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs head of clown and tries to push it into jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the duck out in front of CHI
CHI pushes clown in and out of jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT squeaks duck several times then stops
<aft> MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI tries to shut lid of jack+in+the+box with clown out then knocks the jack+in+the+box over
MOT pushes CHIs hand out of box and shuts the lid
CHI presses on lid with hand
MOT looks closely at box then presses the lid firmly shut and turns the handle several times
CHI continues to feel lid of box with hand
MOT stops turning the handle of the jack+in+the+box then turns it a few more times and stops
CHI slaps other hand on lid of jack+in+the+box and tries to pry the lid open with both hands
MOT takes CHIs hand and tries to make him turn the handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls hand away from MOT
CHI attempts to open the lid of jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI pats lid of jack+in+the+box with both hands
CHI looks at football on the rug
CHI leans close to jack+in+the+box and grabs football
MOT puts hand over jack+in+the+box so it wont hit CHI then continues turning handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of football and grabs clown's head
CHI tries to push clown back into jack+in+the+box then lets go of clown
MOT stops turning handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs clowns head and tries to push it into jack+in+the+box again
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more
CHI shuts lid with clown still out of jack+in+the+box
MOT points downwards with finger at clown
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box again
CHI grabs head of jack+in+the+box and pushes it into the box
CHI pushes on lid of box
MOT feels handle of jack+in+the+box then withdraws hand
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box by handle and sets it in his lap then CHI explores handle with hands
CHI pushes jack+in+the+box onto floor and pulls at its lid
CHI pounds on lid of jack+in+the+box with both hands
MOT reaches for jack+in+the+box and pulls it closer to her
CHI reaches for rubber duck and picks it up
CHI holds and squeaks rubber duck
CHI looks around room at other toys
MOT helps move car closer to CHI
MOT leans closer to CHI then sits back watching him
CHI rolls car on rug then stops
CHI rolls car on rug again
CHI runs car into MOTs leg
CHI lets go of car and grabs jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box onto his lap
CHI puts hand on jack+in+the+box and tries to pull lid open then grabs the handle and flips the box over
INV takes object out of drawer
CHI watches what INV is doing
INV sets forbidden object on table in front of CHI
CHI reaches hand slightly towards object
MOT moves CHIs hand back towards himself
CHI looks at MOT hand then at object
<$=2> MOT holds CHI arms preventing him from touching object
MOT pulls CHIs arm away from object
MOT leans face close to CHIs
MOT holds CHIs arm next to his body
CHI lets go of toy in other hand and tries to reach for object with free hand
<$=1> MOT blocks CHIs way with her arm
CHI struggles to get free of MOTs hand
CHI gets arm free from MOT and reaches for object
MOT presses on CHIs chest so he can't get close enough to touch object
CHI continues to stare at object
MOT takes one of CHIs arms in each hand
MOT claps CHIs hands together then stops
MOT claps CHIs hands together more then stops
MOT claps CHIs hands together once
CHI continues to look at object
MOT claps CHI hands together several times
CHI looks at MOTs hand and smiles
MOT claps CHIs hands together once
MOT pulls CHIs arms wide apart and claps them together again
MOT claps CHIs hands together once
MOT pulls CHIs arms wide apart then claps them together
MOT claps CHIs hands a few more times then lets go of CHIs arms
CHI watches INV put object away
<aft> INV leaves room and shuts the door
MOT takes ball out of box on desk and shows it to CHI
CHI holds out hands towards MOT and ball
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI runs towards MOT and ball
MOT holds ball out to CHI
MOT bends to pick up ball
CHI tries to pick up ball and falls
CHI remains seated where he fell then reaches for the ball
CHI picks up the ball then rolls it to MOT
MOT sits across from CHI holding out both arms toward him
<aft> MOT catches ball then rolls ball to CHI
CHI picks up ball and bites it
CHI crawls away from MOT and stands up
MOT bounces ball on the floor
CHI grabs back of chair and rocks it back and forth a few times
MOT tosses ball in air and catches it
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT tosses ball in air and catches it
CHI runs to MOT with arms outstretched
MOT tosses ball and catches it again
CHI stumbles backward while holding ball and biting it
MOT holds on to CHIs waist as he backs up with the ball then lets go when CHI is stable
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
CHI walks towards MOT with ball then stops
MOT holds hands out towards CHI again
<bef> CHI trips and falls down then bites ball
CHI continues to hold onto ball and bite it
MOT pulls ball closer to self while CHI holds on
CHI continues to hold onto ball
MOT shakes ball while CHI holds on
CHI continues to hold onto ball
MOT pulls ball out of CHIs hands and hugs it to her chest
MOT huddles against wall hiding ball
CHI looks at MOT then turns and walks away
<aft> CHI walks to back of chair and grabs it
MOT sits up and looks at CHI
CHI rocks chair back and forth
MOT taps CHI on back with ball then bounces ball on floor and catches it
CHI continues to lean chair back
MOT tosses ball so it lands where CHI will see it
CHI goes to ball and squats to pick it up but misses
MOT holds hands out to CHI
CHI stands up and picks up ball
CHI walks towards MOT while looking at the chair
CHI walks to chair and stands looking at it
<aft> MOT holds hands out to CHI for ball
MOT takes ball from CHI and tosses and catches it
CHI glances at MOT then back at chair
MOT nods head yes while looking at CHI
CHI continues to pull himself up on chair
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT tosses ball and catches it again
CHI grabs back of chair and stands up
CHI stands holding onto back of chair
MOT drops ball and picks CHI up off of chair and sets him on floor
CHI stumbles forward while reaching for the ball
MOT lets go of CHI and crawls after him
CHI continues to walk away from MOT
MOT grabs CHI and pulls him onto her lap
CHI continues to look at chair
MOT steadies CHI with her hands then lets go of him
CHI carries ball and walks to chair then grabs the back of the chair
CHI drops ball on seat of chair and grabs back of chair with two hands
CHI looks at ball then back at chair
CHI pulls himself up onto chair
MOT moves close to CHI and rubs hand on his back
MOT takes ball off chair and holds CHIs arm
CHI stands up and turns around and looks at MOT
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI runs to garbage can holding onto it
<bef> MOT pulls CHIs hand off garbage
CHI starts to pull bag out of garbage
MOT pushes CHI away from garbage and puts bag back
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI looks at ball and reaches arms out for it
MOT holds ball out towards CHI
CHI takes ball from MOT and walks to chair and sets ball on chair then starts to get up on chair
CHI resists and tries to stay at chair
MOT takes ball from CHI and lets go of him
CHI starts to climb back up on chair
MOT takes CHIs hand then lets go of it and tosses ball and catches it
CHI climbs rest of way onto chair
MOT tosses ball and catches it
MOT tosses ball twice and catches it
CHI looks at something on the wall then reaches for it
MOT picks up CHI off chair
MOT carries CHI over to rug
MOT sets CHI down on rug
CHI grabs back of chair and starts to pull himself up on to it
MOT walks to CHI and squats beside him and puts her hand on his bottom
CHI continues to climb on chair
CHI continues to examine the chair
CHI climbs off chair but continues to look at it
MOT stands up and tosses ball and catches it
CHI plays with strings on chair
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI continues to play with strings
MOT tosses ball and catches it
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
MOT tosses ball and catches it
MOT tosses ball and catches it
MOT is not completely in camera range
CHI reaches hands out to MOT
CHI walks towards MOT with arms outstretched
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI turns and walks to chair
CHI continues to climb on chair
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI turns and looks at ball
MOT holds ball out to CHI while walking backward keeping it out of his reach
CHI reaches for the ball and walks towards it
MOT stops and holds ball between her knees
CHI continues to walk towards ball reaching for it then CHI grabs ball and drops it
<bef> CHI sits down on floor and starts to pick up ball
MOT takes ball out of CHIs hands
MOT drops the ball and lets it roll in front of CHI
CHI tries to get up and falls back down
CHI stands up and walks to garbage and looks inside
MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI holds onto garbage can and looks inside
<bef> MOT tosses ball and catches it again
CHI knocks over garbage can and pulls the trash bag out
MOT takes bag from CHI and tries to put it back in can
CHI continues hold onto garbage can
MOT tries to take garbage can from CHI
CHI still holds onto garbage can
MOT pulls CHIs hand off trash can then picks up the can
CHI turns and runs over to chair on table
MOT carries garbage can over to desk
CHI pulls on chair trying to get it off table
MOT carries towel over to rug and sits on floor with it
CHI continues to look at chair
MOT puts towel over her head
<aft> CHI turns and runs to MOT then grabs the towel and pulls it off MOTs head
MOT puts towel back over her head
CHI pulls towel off MOTs head
<bef> CHI holds towel up to his face
MOT puts towel over CHIs head
CHI smiles then turns and looks at chair
CHI starts to climb onto chair
MOT picks up towel and puts it over her head
CHI lets go of chair and runs to MOT
CHI pulls towel off MOTs head
MOT tries to put towel over head
MOT plays tug of war with CHI
MOT pulls on end of towel
CHI lets go of towel and walks to wall outlet
MOT puts arm around CHI and pulls him to her
MOT sets CHI on her lap
MOT puts towel over CHIs head
CHI flaps arms under the towel
CHI tries to take towel off head
MOT pulls towel off CHIs head
CHI smiles . <aft> CHI stands up and starts to walk away from MOT
MOT tosses towel over CHIs head and pulls him back towards her
MOT pulls CHI into lap so he is laying down
MOT pulls towel off CHIs head
MOT sits CHI up and puts towel over her head
CHI crawls out of MOTs lap
CHI runs to wall outlet with stretched out arm
MOT grabs CHIs arm and pulls him away from wall outlet
MOT shakes head no while looking at CHI
CHI turns away from MOT then tries to get up on his knees
<bef> CHI tries to get up and slips then leans on his head
MOT puts towel over CHIs head
CHI starts to run towards wall then takes towel off head
MOT continues to looks around room
CHI runs into wall then falls on floor
MOT picks up CHI and sets him on her lap
MOT rubs CHIs forehead then picks up towel
CHI leans forward and starts to crawl out of MOTs lap
MOT puts towel over her head
CHI stands up and walks towards chair
CHI leans on chair and turns and looks at MOT
CHI turns and wiggles chair attached to table
CHI continues to play with chair
MOT peeks at CHI from under towel
MOT pulls towel away from face then covers back up
CHI runs to MOT and grabs towel then lets go and turns and runs to wires coming out of wall
MOT grabs CHIs hand and pulls him away from wires
<aft> MOT lets go of CHIs hand
CHI runs to chair and grabs back of chair
<$=2> MOT picks CHI up off chair
MOT sets CHI down in front of her between her legs
MOT puts towel over CHIs head
CHI tries to take towel off head
MOT steadies CHI with hand on his elbow
CHI runs towards wires from wall
MOT pulls CHI away from wires
CHI walks to chair on table and grabs it
MOT moves close to CHI on her knees with the towel over her head
CHI continues to play with chair
MOT stands up and walks towards CHI
MOT stands next to CHI with towel over her head
CHI looks at something off screen
MOT touches CHIs hand with her finger
CHI continues to pull chair back and forth
MOT pulls towel off her head
CHI continues to look off screen
MOT takes CHIs hand off chair then lets go of it
CHI puts hand back on chair
CHI reaches with arm and walks towards desk
CHI tries to reach boxes on table
CHI continues to try to get at boxes
CHI tries to pull box off desk
MOT takes CHIs hand off box
CHI continues to look at box
MOT pushes box back onto desk
CHI tries to grab other things on top of table
MOT picks up CHI and carries him back to rug
CHI looks in direction of desk
CHI points towards desk then walks over to it
CHI is out of camera range momentarily
MOT stands up and puts towel away then takes another box off the desk
CHI plays with things around desk . CHI pulls something out from behind the desk
MOT drags CHI back towards rug
MOT starts to take cover off box
CHI walks around to other side of box opposite MOT
CHI squats by box and puts hands on cover
MOT sets cover of box aside and leafs through the paper
CHI picks up crayon out of box and holds it in hands looking at it
MOT takes paper out of box and sets it on rug and pushes box aside
CHI looks at box then back at paper
MOT points to paper with index finger
MOT draws a line on the paper
MOT looks at paper then back at CHI
MOT draws another line on the paper
CHI squats next to paper then kneels on paper and drops crayon
<bef> MOT pulls paper out from under CHI and picks up crayon and hands it to CHI
CHIs actions not visible because he is sitting with his back to the camera
CHI looks around room then back at paper
MOT picks up CHI and sets him beside her then spreads out paper in front of him
CHI is now in view of camera
CHI reaches for crayon in MOTs hand
MOT reaches for crayon then pulls hand back
CHI switches crayon to opposite hand then draws on paper
CHI switches crayons and draws on paper again
CHI turns away from paper and starts to get up
MOT puts hand on CHIs arm
MOT grabs CHI with two hands
MOT sets CHI between her legs with paper in front of both of them
MOT scoots paper close to CHI and sits with her arms around him
MOT takes CHIs hand with crayon and draws circles with him on the paper
CHI leans forward out of MOTs lap
<bef> CHI sits on top of paper and faces MOT
<aft> CHI looks at crayon in hands
CHI looks at crayon MOT is holding
CHI takes crayon from MOT and rubs it together with crayon in other hand
MOT puts hand on CHI and holds onto him
MOT sets CHI back down between her legs
CHI lays on side and kicks his legs scattering the papers
MOT continues to look at papers
CHI stands up and walks to chair
CHI grabs back of chair and starts to pull himself up onto chair
MOT sets down papers and goes to CHI taking his hands
MOT tries to take crayon out of CHIs hand
MOT takes crayon out of CHIs hand
MOT moves back to the paper
MOT sits down near paper and holds up a crayon to CHI
MOT draws on paper with crayon
MOT stops drawing and sets crayon down
CHI walks over and picks up crayon then walks towards MOT and reaches for another crayon
CHI takes crayon from MOT and reaches for another crayon
CHI stands in front of box cover
CHI steps onto edge of box lid and rocks back and forth
CHI turns towards MOT and holds out both hands with crayons in them . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI then back at papers
CHI looks at crayons in his hands
<aft> CHI puts a crayon in his mouth
<bef> MOT sets down paper then pulls crayon out of CHIs mouth
crayon from CHIs mouth fell on the floor
MOT reaches for crayon that fell
CHI watches MOT while standing in the box
<bef> CHI loses balance and starts to fall
MOT grabs CHIs arm and steadies him
MOT holds onto CHIs arm and helps him walk off of box cover
CHI walks to paper then stands in front of MOT looking down
MOT leans close to paper again and starts to draw
CHI sits down next to paper and grabs the crayon MOT is drawing with
CHI looks at crayons in his hands
<aft> CHI tries to stand up and slips
CHI falls on top of paper
CHI sits up and touches a crayon to the paper
MOT points to paper with index finger
CHI drops crayon then squats to stand up
CHI grabs crayons off paper then stands up
CHI walks away from MOT toward the desk
CHI tries to reach things on top of desk
CHI lets go of desk and turns to look towards MOT
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
CHI looks at crayons he is holding
CHI bends over and picks up crayons
CHI stands back up holding crayons
MOT holds hand out towards CHI
CHI holds crayons out and walks to MOT
MOT holds hand out towards CHI
<aft> CHI turns and walks toward table
CHI places both hands on top of the table
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT glances at paper then back at CHI
CHI runs to paper and squats leaning on paper with his hands
MOT stops drawing and puts crayon down
CHI lets go of paper and picks up crayon
CHI sits down holding crayon in hand
MOT draws on paper with crayon
CHI tries to take crayon from MOT
<bef> CHI grabs onto chair and stands up
MOT points to paper with index finger
<aft> CHI turns to look at MOT
MOT moves to CHI and pushes chair aside
<bef> CHI holds crayon out to MOT
MOT taps paper with index finger
CHI holds crayon out farther towards MOT
MOT holds hand out for crayon
CHI holds crayon out even closer to MOT
CHI holds another crayon out to MOT
MOT draws on paper with crayon
MOT stops drawing and reaches for crayon from CHI
MOT takes crayon from CHIs hand
CHI stands up and starts to climb back up on chair
MOT stops drawing and holds up crayons for CHI to see
CHI gets down from chair then walks to MOT and grabs crayons in her hands
CHI backs away from MOT a few steps
MOT points to paper with index finger
MOT reaches to pick up crayon
CHI stoops and grabs crayon before MOT can reach it
<bef> CHI walks away from paper and sits down facing MOT and holding crayon
MOT picks up crayon CHI dropped
CHI drops another crayon then picks it up and stands up
CHI walks over to another crayon
CHI picks up crayon and walks towards MOT
MOT holds up crayon in front of CHI
CHI sits down on rug and faces MOT
<bef> MOT pushes paper closer to CHI
MOT picks up box and puts papers inside then sets box down in front of CHI
CHI takes papers out of box and throws them behind him
CHI feels in box with hand to get hold of another piece of paper
CHI continues trying to get hold of papers then manages to flings them out of box
<bef> CHI picks up crayons then gets up and walks over to chair
MOT picks up papers and puts them in the box
CHI walks towards MOT . <aft> CHI watches MOT
MOT continues putting papers in box
MOT points to drawing on paper
CHI looks at crayons he is holding
MOT continues to put papers in box
CHI looks back at what MOT is doing
MOT continues to put papers in box
CHI looks at crayon on floor
CHI stands up and walks towards desk
MOT puts last of papers in box
MOT carries CHI back into middle of rug and camera view
MOT sets CHI down but holds onto him with one hand
MOT puts crayons in box and tries to put the cover on
CHI watches what MOT is doing
End of Paper and Crayon Activity
CHI tries to walk to box
MOT restrains CHI with hand on him
MOT tries to get cover on box
MOT gets cover on box and lets go of CHI
CHI runs to box and puts hands on it and sits beside box
MOT stands up and picks the box up
MOT brings box over to CHI on floor
CHI looks at book in box
CHI crawls into box and puts hands on book
MOT sets cover to box aside
MOT pulls box out from under CHI and stands up and sets box and cover on desk
CHI holds book and stands up
CHI looks at box on top of desk
MOT sits down and puts her hand on CHI
MOT pulls CHI onto her lap
MOT takes book from CHI and holds it open in front of him
MOT points to picture on the page
<bef> CHI grabs book and pulls it close to him
MOT turns page and holds onto book
CHI touches page then turns away from book and thrashes on MOTs lap
MOT puts book in front of CHIs face
MOT points to picture on page
CHI takes hold of book with one hand
CHI takes book and shuts it
CHI walks away from MOT while looking down at the book
CHI walks to table and waves book in air
<bef> CHI waves book a few more times then walks around end of table holding onto it and stomps his feet
CHI gets on floor and crawls out of view of camera
<aft> MOT gets up and walks over to CHI
MOT carries CHI back to middle of rug
MOT sets CHI down and squats beside him
MOT sets book on chair and pulls chair close to CHI
MOT sits down next to chair
MOT takes book off of chair then holds it open so CHI can see
CHI looks at MOT then at chair
MOT looks at picture of CHI and points to it with her thumb then MOT looks back at CHI
MOT moves book closer to CHI
CHI takes book from MOT then slides off chair
CHI walks towards door carrying book
MOT points to picture on page as CHI walks past her
CHI stops walking and stands looking at book
CHI opens and shuts the book
CHI takes a few quick steps backwards
CHI backs up to door then walks along it feeling it
CHI feels door jam with hand
MOT is concerned CHI fingers will be caught in opening door
